Class SessionManager

java.lang.Object
sessionManagement.SessionManager
public class SessionManager extends Object
Manages user sessions, providing functionality to create, retrieve, and remove sessions. Sessions are stored with an expiration time of 30 minutes.
Author:
24862664

    • createSession

      public String createSession()
      Creates a new session and returns its unique session ID.
      Returns:
      The new session ID.

    • getSession

      public Session getSession(String sessionId)
      Retrieves a session by its ID, or null if the session is expired or doesn't exist.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID.
      Returns:
      The session if valid, null if expired or invalid.

    • removeSession

      Parameters:
